p: Human breast (MCF-7), colon (HT-29), neuroblastoma (SH-SY5Y), embryonal carcinoma (NCCIT) cancer cell lines and human umbilical vein endothelial cell (HUVEC) as a normal cell line, were used during the experiments. Cell lines were purchased from the Cell Bank of Pasteur Institute, Tehran, Iran. MCF-7, HT-29, SH-SY5Y and HUVEC were maintained in Dulbecco’s Modifed Eagle’s Medium (DMEM; Gibco) and NCCIT were cultured in RPMI 1640 (Gibco). Both medium was supplemented with 10% of fetal bovine serum (FBS) and 1% of penicillin and streptomycin. Cells were grown at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere with 5% CO 2.
